game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient temple
game.description: The ancient temple holds a legendary artifact that has been stolen by the rogue enemy forces. Your mission is to infiltrate the temple, retrieve the artifact, and return safely.

task.description: Travel through the treacherous jungle to reach the ancient temple.
Infiltrate the enemy lines covertly to gain entry into the temple.
Find the artifact in the heart of the temple and retrieve it.
